item.title: Report X-2025010730
item.description:
Report X-2025010730

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-16
  • City: BEND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Undeclared Lithium Ion Generator found during sort. No signs for being hazmat except for some side info on container describing as over 1000 Watt Hours. Upon online research, most Jackery Generators were found to contain Lithium Ion Batteries. However, there was no actual spill of the product.

item.title: Report X-2025010849
item.description:
Report X-2025010849

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-07
  • City: ONTARIO
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNION PACIFIC RAILROAD COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PROX 36278 was found releasing from the vapor valve. The valve was found to be closed, yet leaking and securement plug not installed. Plug was secured stopping the release.
